summary: Adjusts Yngvols Helm to more closely match Steel Armor.
descriptionHtml:
--
Description
--

This is a quick and dirty adjustment of Yngvol\'s Helm, changing it such that it more closely matches the Steel Armor set. Primarily intended for people who like the model, but don\'t have any matching gear.

--
Install
--

Drop the Data folder into your Skyrim folder and choose to merge the folders.

--
Uninstall
--

Delete \"yngolshelm\" from Skyrim / Data / textures / armor
author: Tair
